question:
(a)With the aid of a diagram, illustrate six branches of trade and show six types of retail outlets.

(b) State eight features of hawking.
answer:
(b) Features of hawking are:

(i) It is usually a one-man business 

(ii) It involves moving about.

(iii) It is a small - scale business.

(iv) It involves relatively small capital outlay. 

(v) It deals in various articles

(vi) Customers are reached at their door - step.

(vii) Price are competitive.

(viii) It is energy sapping and prone to accident or hazards.
